nodes.text: Nkllon was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Expansion Region, positioned at the coordinates L-16 on the Standard Galactic Grid.

Nkllon was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon on a map featured in the 2016 StarWars.com article Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Star Wars: The Force Awakens?.  In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Nkllon first appeared in Heir to the Empire, a novel written by Timothy Zahn and published in 1991.
